name: Fighting Fish
description:
Fighting Fish is a VR action-adventure game, in which the player can drive around on a boat and shoot fish. 

The goal is to get further on the lake, until the final boss can be challenged. On this adventure the player gets help from the mechanic Pickwick and his trusty dog, Santiago. During gameplay, more about the story of Floundster Village is revealed.

This is the Animation Legacy Version of the Game! It got different models for the fishes, some fixes of the items and (like the name already said) animations!

A game by: Erik Lopez Gerner - Programming 
Katherine Tiedemann - Art
Konstantin Kallus - Programming
Katarzyna Kamieniew - Art
